name: Pao's Sapa Leisure Hotel
address: Muong Hoa Street, Sapa Town, Sapa District, Lao Cai Province, Sa Pa, Việt Nam
description:
Tọa lạc ở Sa Pa, cách Trạm cáp treo Fansipan 6.1 km, Pao's Sapa Leisure Hotel cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có trung tâm thể dục, chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí, khu vườn và phòng chờ chung. Chỗ nghỉ này có các tiện nghi như nhà hàng, câu lạc bộ trẻ em và dịch vụ phòng, cùng với Wi-Fi miễn phí. Chỗ nghỉ này cung cấp quầy lễ tân 24 giờ, dịch vụ tiền sảnh và dịch vụ thu đổi ngoại tệ cho khách.

Mỗi phòng đều được thiết kế có điều hòa, két an toàn và TV màn hình phẳng, ngoài ra một số căn tại khách sạn có ban công.

Pao's Sapa Leisure Hotel có phục vụ bữa sáng thực đơn buffet hoặc kiểu lục địa.

Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp chỗ nghỉ 5 sao với hồ bơi trong nhà và sân hiên. Khách có thể chơi bi-a tại Pao's Sapa Leisure Hotel. Ngoài ra, đi xe đạp là hoạt động được ưa chuộng trong khu vực.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần khách sạn bao gồm Hồ Sa Pa, Sa Pa Stone Church và Sa Pa Bus Station. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Wenshan Puzhehei, cách Pao's Sapa Leisure Hotel 222 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive:
Das Zimmer mit Talblick war sehr gross, der Balkon mit Aussicht auf das Tal/Stadt ein absoluter Traum - vor allem abends und früh morgens. 
Zimmerservice gab es täglich, das Personal ist stets freundlich und zuvorkommend gewesen. 
Das Hotel bietet außerdem einen kostenlosen Shuttle Service, um in die Stadt zu kommen. Man kann aber auch darauf verzichten, denn die Stadt ist etwa in 15 Minuten zu Fuss erreichbar. 
Ein kleiner Markt für Getränke und Snacks ist nur wenige Minuten entfernt. 
Unmittelbar vor dem Hotel befindet sich die Sehenswürdigkeit Moana Sapa. Der Eintritt dafür beträgt 80.000 VND. Auch das Cat Cat Village befindet sich in der Nähe (ca. 1 Std zu Fuß). 

Ich bin dort 2 Nächte geblieben und bin rundum zufrieden gewesen. Bisher die schönste und angenehmste Unterkunft, die ich auf meiner Reise in Nordvietnam hatte. Ich habe diese Unterkunft gleich meinen Freundinnen weiterempfohlen.
Falls ich Sapa wieder besuchen sollte, werde ich definitiv wieder diese Unterkunft buchen.

review.rating: Fantastisch hotel met geweldig personeel en alle luxe die je op vakantie kunt wensen
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive:
Prachtig hotel voorzien van alle luxe. We werden uiterst vriendelijk welkom geheten. Het personeel was het hele verblijf enorm behulpzaam. Ze spraken goed Engels. Daarnaast hebben ze een bureau waar je geholpen wordt met reisinformatie. Ze hebben ons daar geholpen aan tickets voor de Fansipan kabelbaan en ook aan een nachtbus naar Ninh Binh, ookal was Ninh Binh voor het hotel geen gebruikelijke bestemming waar ze bij assisteren. Er werd echt extra moeite gedaan en dat vonden we enorm fijn. Complimenten aan het personeel. Uitmuntende service! Bedankt!

En dan vergeet ik nog dat we een gratis upgrade kregen en dat het uitzicht vanaf het balkon prachtig was over de vallei!
review.comment_negative: Helemaal niets.

review.comment_positive: Pao's Sapa Leisure Hotel is located beautifully in front of one of Sapa's many valleys, looking at typical rice terraces and mountains. Besides very friendly and supportive staff, the hotel offers a nice restaurant and spa experience. The gym is also well equipped and offers enough equipment for a good workout. I'll be happy to visit again next time I'm around.

review.rating: Top range customer service and room view.
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thung Lũng
review.comment_positive:
The customer service was top range from the bell boys at the front entrance to the front desks reception. Quick and easy checkin. 

The hotel have a million dollar view, it so beautiful mountain and village view. Me and wife loved it surprised what we can see. Little disappointed we can see the sea of clouds in the morning but expected it and NO negative points are given to the hotel.

The room is big and have a nice clean big bathtub. It also have nice view from it.
review.comment_negative: Location not very great and bit far from the city centre. NO negative points and NO complaints as I already know when I booked the hotel. I went for the view and photos taking location.

review.rating: will stay here again when I come back in SaPa !
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thung Lũng
review.comment_positive:
came from Hong Kong for 2 days in sapa as part of our 2 weeks trip in Vietnam.I believe paos is the best hotel in sapa for the price. quite please with the service and the facilities (don’t forget we are in Vietnam and in the middle of the mountain). The view is stunning from the balcony and our bath tub.


the restaurant is also good and relatively affordable. 

the FO manager speak quite good English and really took care of us during our entire stay. 

only one downside is the trekking agency that they helped us book didn’t really deliver on their promise. but the FO manager gave us a discount to make up for it which was much appreciated!
for people looking to trek I recommend fansipan instead of the small village (really tourist trap in my opinion)

review.rating: Our stay at Pao's Sapa was great, close to town but far enough away to be quiet.
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: We were greeted by Mr Tham at reception on arrival, and he was very good in explaining everything. As we had left our phone chargers behind, he offered to charge them for us which was great. Our room and view from the balcony were very nice looking over the mountains, Breakfast was excellent with lots of choice and a view over the valley as well. The free shuttle bus to town every 2 hours was a fantastic bonus. We booked our cable car to Fansipan and a massage which were both looked after by the lady at the tour desk at the hotel and she made sure everything went to plan, Overall a great stay, and we would recommend Pao's Sa Pa to our friends.
review.comment_negative: Our bed was a little firm for us but we still slept well.

Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive:
We had a wonderful stay at Pao's Sapa Leisure Hotel.  Very beautiful and stunning mountain and valley view.  All staff is very helpful and knowledgeable, Katie, Dinh and all others, including securitystaff outside at the parkinglot, whose names I can't remember.  It is a large hotel but the staff is able to provide personal attention.  They speak good English, which is nice for making contact.  They provide correct and reliable information. The restaurant serves very good breakfast and dinner.  The room is perfect.  It has everything you need and is also very clean.
Temperature at Sapa is very pleasant. There are lots of things to do. Even the Hmong ladies outside the hotels are also friendly and always smiling. 
Pao's Sapa Leisure Hotel is now on our favourite list of hotels. 
Next time we'll definitely come back to Pao's Sapa Leisure Hotel again.
review.comment_negative: Everything is perfect.

review.comment_positive: Ubicación y la atención del personal
review.comment_negative: Nada en particular

review.rating: Tolle Aussicht aber das Hotel hat noch an einigen Punkten zu arbeiten
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Das Zimmer war gut ausgestattet, sauber und bequem. Die Aussicht ist wirklich wunderschön auf Berge und Täler. Das Personal an der Rezeption war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir sind mit dem Nachtbus aus Hanoi angereist, waren daher sehr früh da und durften schon um 10:30 Uhr ins Zimmer obwohl der offizielle Checkin erst um 14 Uhr ist. Das Hotel hat einen kostenlosen Shuttle in die Innenstadt organisiert welcher sehr zuverlässig und frequent fuhr.
review.comment_negative:
Die beworbenen Einrichtungen (Pool, Spa, Bar, Club) sind entweder geschlossen oder in schlechten Zustand. Am Pool ist eine Baustelle, alles ist rostig, marode und es tropft überall von der Decke weil scheinbar der Abzug defekt oder nicht vorhanden ist. Es gibt auch kaum Liegemöglichkeiten. 
Wir waren über Silvester in dem Hotel. Es wurde zwar ein Silvester Menü angeboten aber um halb 12 also kurz vor Neujahr war weder die Bar, noch der Club oder sonst irgendwas in dem Hotel geöffnet. An der Rezeption wurde uns erklärt das liegt am Personalmangel. Fanden wir trotzdem sehr schade, dass man an Silvester um 12 Uhr nicht mal mehr was zum trinken bekommt. 
Das Frühstück hatten wir nicht inklusive aber das konnte man für 300.000 Dong dazu buchen. Für vietnamesische Verhältnisse ist das schon sehr teuer und da war nicht mal Cappuccino inbegriffen. Das Personal beim Frühstück konnte leider kaum englisch was oftmals zu Missverständnissen und nicht allzu guten Service führte.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive: We were really lucky to get this hotel. Location was perfect being on the edge of the city. Quiet and at the start of the trekking routes made it convenient. The views would be one of the best and luxury of the hotel made it an excellent choice. Wouldn’t pick any other

review.comment_positive:
Soggiornare in questo hotel è stata un'esperienza straordinaria. L'atmosfera accogliente e il personale cordiale hanno reso il mio soggiorno molto piacevole. 

La camera era spaziosa, pulita e ben arredata e la vista sulla valle semplicemente stupenda.

 La colazione a buffet era deliziosa, con una vasta selezione di cibi freschi e deliziosi. Inoltre, la posizione dell'hotel ha reso facile esplorare i luoghi d'interesse. 

Consiglio vivamente questo hotel a chiunque cerchi un soggiorno confortevole

review.rating: Amazing hotel right in the heart of Sapa! Totally recommend!
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is amazing! It has all the important facilities, from spa, to roof top, lounge areas, bar, etc. 
Staff was always prompt to answer our question/ give suggestions about where to go, very kind.
The view from the dinning area is simply amazing, breathtaking. The breakfast was one of the most complete I have ever seen (not just Asian but also western) everything for everyone! Tasty, fresh products well prepared. They also serve lunch and dinner in the hotel which is handy.
The room was very clean, spacious and with a nice balcony overlooking the rice fields! Amazing with all the toiletries etc! 
We loved it and we would love to comeback once visiting Sapa again!
review.comment_negative:
The pool was out of service for maintenance.
I did one full body massage and the environment did not have music and it is important for me to fully relax.

Besides, it was all amazing.

review.comment_positive: Our stay at Pao's Sapa Leisure Hotel was nothing short of magical. Surrounded by misty mountains and terraced rice fields, the hotel's ambiance was enchanting. The rooms were cozy, offering stunning views of the Sapa Valley, while the staff's warm hospitality made us feel at home. The hotel's spa and wellness facilities provided a relaxing escape after days of exploring. With delicious local cuisine and thoughtful amenities, Pao's Sapa Leisure Hotel truly captured the essence of Sapa's natural beauty and offered an unforgettable experience. We left rejuvenated and utterly charmed

review.comment_positive:
10/10 hotel, cannot recommend Pao’s enough. As other reviewers have alluded too, it is a five/ten minute walk into the main town, however the view is incomparable to hotels in the town. The bedroom and bathroom are extremely generous in size and with faultless cleaning. Breakfast is unmissable and an experience in itself, completely delicious.

Alongside the gorgeous hotel and food are the charming staff. Reception and catering staff go above and beyond to adhere to all your needs. I am so grateful for Katie who helped arrange our transfer and an extra night at the hotel last minute. Kitchen staff helped with all our food and drink needs. I love this hotel and wish I could have stayed longer.

review.comment_positive:
Everything! The staff are ALL very helpful and nice. They helped us out with booking cars, tickets for Fansipan and accommodating with spa appointments. 
the location is amazing. When the skies are clear the view is amazing. It is a very short and doable walk down from the city center. there is a free shuttle as well as cheap golf cart type carts to drive you into town or anywhere you want to go. 
The spa was so relaxing, I went twice! 
The room was spectacular. we were upgraded and it did not disappoint. The rooms were clean, massive and had all of the amenities, even a yoga mat for stretching which was key after the drive up from Hanoi.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive: We stayed at Pao's for 2 nights - arriving early morning and leaving late at night. The concierge was so kind to allow us to check-in earlier and even went out of their way to provide real-time assistance via WhatsApp. It made coordinating logistics and transport so much easier. It helps that they have a shuttle bus service to/fro the town centre too! Rooms were big and clean, with great view of the valley. Would happily recommend this hotel to others visiting Sapa.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive: Die Lage des Hotels ist hervorragend weil man einen tollen Blick auf das Tal hat. Unser Zimmer war sehr modern, groß, komfortabel und hatte einen grandiosen Ausblick. Das Frühstück ist sehr umfassend und lecker und es gibt viele vegetarische Optionen. Das Spa ist ein absolutes Highlight und die Massagen sehr zu empfehlen. Der Service war gut und unsere Probleme wurden durch Gespräche mit dem Manager umgehend geklärt.
review.comment_negative: Leider sprechen einige Mitarbeiter*innen kein Englisch, was die Kommunikation z.T erschwert.

review.comment_positive:
We loved everything, Pao's Sapa has been internationally designed to reflect the rice fields. Great thought has gone into its design 
Wonderful staff who were so helpful & kind. 
Delicious buffet breakfast.
Our room was lovely it had a large picture window, so the fabulous views were magic.
It's out of the hustle and bustle but easy access to town.
review.comment_negative:
We didn't book tours through the hotel as they were twice as expensive as those offered around Sapa town.
Food & drinks are expensive compared to street prices, which is such a shame because everyone goes out for dinner in Sapa town, where it's much cheaper even for coffee.
I don't know why big hotels price themselves out of the market for food & drinks

review.rating: Beautiful views in a comfy room.
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Beautiful views and quiet area as away from the centre of town. Free shuttle to and from town every 2hrs or a 15-20min walk uphill. We were upgraded as mentioned it was our honeymoon trip when booking, however there seemed to be some maintenance happening during our stay as there was a fair bit of banging above our room during daylight hours. Bed was MASSIVE and very comfortable. Bathroom was big, shower was amazing (especially after a day of hiking). Great buffet selection for breakfast.
review.comment_negative: Quite overpriced for what you get (especially for Vietnam). Wouldn’t use the washing services as that cost us triple the price of every other time we used a washing service ($60AUD for a small wash). Room not very soundproof and we had a few nights where the people in the room next door were very loud in their room and the hallway (though I think this is more an issue of their bad etiquette than the soundproofing of the room itself).

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
Suite
review.comment_positive:
-The best 5-stared hotel in Sapa, I stayed in Mgallery several times and stayed here this time once again but disappointed so I moved to Pao.
-Location: Good, just a little bit far from the centre but they arrange free e-cab for you to move around
-The room is clean, spacious, minimalistic, overlooking the best nature view of Sapa (from the balcony and the bathroom). The best thing in Pao.
-Food: Over my expectation for a hotel. Usually, hotel's food isn't good as local restaurants but Pao changed my mind. Delicious but isn't expensive.
-Staff: Really supportive and friendly. Feeling comfortable staying here
-Spa: quite good, got an 20% off (I don't know why haha)

review.rating: Would have been a more comfortable stay if it wasn’t that boost
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: view on the valley, location just outside the noisy center.  Staff very helpfull and especially Katie.
review.comment_negative: very thin walls and with loud Chinese/ Vietnamese neighbours next to your room it can become quite annoying !!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive:
- the view is really nice
- the room is big
- there were so kind to bring us something to eat even dough we ordered right at the time when the kitchen closes
review.comment_negative:
- not a lot vegan options for breakfast, even if they confirmed they will organize more during our stay
- the check in could be more friendly
- as a 5 star hotel you could organize a fruit bowl or similar as a welcome gift for the guests (so then they would have something to eat even if they arrive as late as we did (delay with the bus).)
- the regulation sheet has a lot of things listed what not to do and what fines wait if they are still commited. F.e. being loud. 1. Its nog really welcoming 2. This should be valid for the hotel too, on the second night, shortly before mid night a team came and started cleaning some bugs with loud machines. This is not acceptable, since there was no info for the guests, else the time chosen for this was just strange?
- the hotel seems to have a bug problem..when we arrived there were more than 8 flying bugs in the room, i guess they are coming out from the bathroom. In times of corona this is not understandable (low bookings, 5 star hotel and having a bug problem and not solving it is not ok)
- we reserved a bike at the reception for a ride (about 5 hours), we paid abour 230'000 this us really much for the condition the bike was in. The funny thing was that the lady at the desk said to make sure to put on the helmet, but arrived at the bike I was not able since the helmet closure was broken, so I had to hold it all the time
- we wanted to use the pool, came there, it was closed, ok waited till somebody opened. Then once in the water we recognized different bugs dead in the water.. again dirty impression for a 5 star.
- also we were distrubed a few times with no reason, the door bell was ringing and once we opened we saw some staff who just walked away with no communication. The same in the night, were other guests tried to open our door. This is also a misterious thing, when they have just a few guests in the hotel like in our case, why not devide them in seperate sides of the hotel, instead of having them grouped door to...

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
이번 베트남 여행에서 가장 기대한 곳이 사파여서 호텔을 고르는데 심혈을 기울였다고 감히 말할 수 있고, 결과는 대성공이었다.
가장 크게 기대한 건 다랭이논으로 유명한 사파에서 최고의 위치에 있다는 호텔의 전망이었는데, 정말로 최고였다. 뿐만 아니다. 기대 이상으로 앞으로는 눈앞에 백두산보다 높은 판시판이 텐진산맥과 함께 병풍을 이루고, 맞은편 사파 시내쪽으로는 승천하다 입을 벌린 채 굳어버린 용의 모습을 한 함롱산이 판시판 못지않게 위용을 보이고 있다. 
여행사에서 가는 다랭이논 투어는 가이드와 함께 걸어서 가는데, 호텔 바로 옆길에서 시작된다. 다만 사파 중심가라 할 성당이나 호수와는 2km 거리가 떨어져 있는데, 우리는 걸어 다니거나 두시간마다 운영되는 호텔셔틀버스를 이용했다.
파오스는 시설들도 아주 훌륭하다. 
조식 레스토랑의 전망은 눈앞에 펼쳐진 판시판과 다랭이논들을 보며 먹는데, 맛도 좋았고 가짓수도 풍부하고 메뉴는 매일 변화하여 아침이 기대될 정도였다. 쌀국수와 달걀요리를 주문받는 실사코너도 운영했다. 우리는 점심도 이 레스토랑도 두 번 이용했는데, 호텔에서 이 가격을 받나 싶게 가격이 싸게 느껴졌고, 반미와 쌀국수를 주문하고 훌륭하게 세팅이 된 일품요리를 맛볼 수 있어 행복했다. 
실내수영장은 미온수였는데 사계절 수영이 가능하게 잘 관리한다. 수영선수가 와도 만족할 만큼 풀은 넓고 깊었고, 나같은 초보자를 안심하고 수영할 정도인 최고의 시설이었다. 나는 여기 머무는 동안 피트니스를 하루도 빼먹지 않았는데 요가 매트부터 아령까지 다 갖추었고 인적없는 구석이 아닌 호텔 출입구에 있어 그것도 마음에 들었다. 나는 파오스에서 7박 동안 하루도 빠짐없이 수영장과 피트니스를 이용했다. 
객실로 말하자면 가히 입이 다물어지지 않을 정도인데, 전체적인 호텔의 디자인이 다랭이논밭을 형상화한 것이어서인지 호텔 곳곳에 넓은 화단이 가꾸어져 있는데, 객실 안도 마찬가지였다. 객실 안도 널찍하고 호화로운데 베란다에는 화단이 가꾸어져 있다. 모든 객실에 사루비아와 장미가 핀 화단을 가진 호텔이라니 얼마나 관리하기 힘들지 모르지만 우리는 매순간 너무나 즐거웠다.
우리는 여기에 믿기지 않을 또 하나의 서비스까지 받았는데 바로 객실 업그레이드였다. 광대한 자연이 펼쳐지는 전망과는 조금 비껴 있어도 아름답기만한 방이어서 조금의 요구도 불만도 없는데 왜 이게 가능했는지 지금도 알 수 없지만, 지금도 감사하게 생각한다. 당연히 새로운 방은 전망도 좋았고 널따란 욕조까지 따라오는 호화로운 곳이었다. 정말 감사하게 생각한다. 
사파라는 ‘고원에 핀 꽃’과 도시에서 머문 8일간 내내 즐거웠고, 특히나 파오스에 머물 수 있어서 더 좋았다.

review.comment_positive: We loved our stay here! The staff went above and beyond for us, they were so thoughtful and warm, and we felt that we could ask for their help with anything. The breakfast was fantastic, we were amazed at the scale and variety (especially compared to other places we’ve stayed in Vietnam). The view is a real highlight, we felt so lucky to have such a fabulous view. The location is a bit of a walk from the the center of town, but this means it’s peaceful and quiet. They also offer a free shuttle in and out of town every 2 hours which made things easier. We would highly recommend this stay!

review.comment_positive: The proper was very well located and close to the town center and the shuttles were quite convenient even though they were every two hours instead of one like many other hotels. The views from the bar area during sunset were really nice too.
review.comment_negative:
- last shuttle is at 8:30 pm which is such an odd time because it’s right in the middle of dinner time so you have to plan meticulously or just walk it like we did most times on our way back 
- pillows in the rooms are way too high and uncomfortable 
- the drinks at the bar are horrible (both coffee and cocktails). I got the fresh orange juice and it felt like the powdered orange juice with a bit of pulp and when I asked them to give me room temperature they just heated it in the microwave so it was super hot and was gross 
- the pool area looks nice in photos but is in another side of the building in a basement type of location so it feels very dingy in real life and super damp smell
- the bathrooms were not super clean and felt quite icky 
- the balcony’s in the rooms facing the valley could do with some work. A lot of it was just a patch of mud and not so nice to look at 
- room service coffee was not good.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive:
Pao‘s Sapa liegt etwas außerhalb von Sapa, wobei die Lage ein Pluspunkt ist. Die Anlage ist sehr modern, sauber und das Personal ist sehr freundlich.

Das Frühstück war gut und reichhaltig, wir haben auch nachmittags im Restaurant gegessen (Empfehlung: das Banh Mi mit Pommes) sowie die Happy Hour für Cocktails genutzt (sehr lecker!).

Die Tipps von den Mitarbeitenden waren sehr hilfreich, das Hotel ist schick, der Shuttle-Service war gut - wir würden wieder hier buchen!

Pao's Sapa is located just outside Sapa, although the location is a plus point. The facility is very modern, clean and the staff is very friendly.

The breakfast was good and plentiful, we also ate in the restaurant in the afternoon (recommendation: the Banh Mi with fries) and used the happy hour for cocktails (very tasty!).

The tips from the staff were very helpful, the hotel is chic - we would book here again!
review.comment_negative:
Wir waren im Februar während dichten Nebels in Sapa; um die Zeit im Hotel zu verbringen, waren uns Restaurant und Lobby ein wenig zu zugig (was auch daran lag, dass kurz vor unserer Ankunft die große Eingangstür beschädigt wurde und deshalb fehlte, wofür das Hotel natürlich nichts kann). 

Vom Abendessen waren wir nicht so richtig überzeugt; es war vergleichsweise teuer und das Essen war anders als erwartet (statt gebratener Nudeln kamen Nudeln in süß-saurer Sauce). 

We were in Sapa in February during thick fog; the restaurant and lobby were a little too draughty for us to spend time in the hotel (which was also due to the fact that the large entrance door was damaged shortly before our arrival and was therefore missing, for which the hotel is of course not responsible). 

We were not really convinced by the dinner; it was comparatively expensive and the food was different than expected (instead of fried noodles, we had noodles in sweet and sour sauce).

review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The hotel was lovely and in a great location on the edge of town overlooking rice fields and hills. The hotel runs a shuttle bus to town but i mainly walked. On one occasion I got a taxi back which cost less than £1.50. The staff were all very friendly and made me feel really welcome.  My room was great with the biggest bed I've ever seen and a balcony with great views. I used the swimming pool and I was very  relieved to find it was heated.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive:
Khách sạn có view thung lũng siêu đẹp. Nhân viên nhiệt tình, chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện, hiếu khách. Đồ ăn sáng phong phú, bún rất ngon. Khách sạn có thiết kế rất sáng tạo, giống như ruộng bậc thang đặc trưng vùng núi. Phòng ngủ với phong cách trẻ trung pha trộn với bản sắc dân tộc bản địa. Giường êm ái. Mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời. 
Phòng của tôi được nâng hạng miễn phí do ở ngày trong tuần và đã ở đây 5 lần rồi.
Đặc biệt recommend cho các bạn ăn thử lẩu thắng cố, gà Hmong ủ bí với thảo mộc. Chỉ có thể nói là xuất sắc, hoàn toàn ko có mì chính như ăn trong các nhà hàng khác. 
Cảm ơn các bạn, tôi sẽ quay lại  Pao nhiều lần nữa nếu có dịp trong thời gian tới.
review.comment_negative: Mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời. Ko có gì để chê. Tôi hoàn toàn hài lòng với dịch vụ ở đây.

The staff is very accommodating, they asked about how are room is, and when we gave a feedback that it’s not as clean as we hope it would be, they rushed into our room to clean it thoroughly. I love how quickly they reacted, and how much care they provide for their customers.
review.comment_negative: The interior finishes looks dated. A lot of the interiors inside the room seem worn and torn. You can see the edges of the wall are already chipping. The tiles, the grouting and the laminates are already tattered. The phone in our room is not working so we always have to go down the reception whenever we have questions.

review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_negative:
Tôi đã được nhân viên khách sạn liên hệ trước khi tới và nói sẽ xếp phòng view đẹp cho chúng tôi. Chúng tôi nhận phòng vào tối muộn, sương mù dày đặc nên không nhìn được view. Sáng sớm hôm sau chúng tôi dậy từ 5h sáng đón mặt trời thì giật mình với view phòng thẳng ra nghĩa địa. Tôi đã kiến nghị với lễ Tân và được trả lời sẽ trình sếp và tôi đợi nhưng không thấy hồi âm, gần trưa tôi lại hỏi thêm lần nữa có thể đổi phòng khác và lại nhận được câu: để trình lên xin ý kiến sếp. 
Kết quả chúng tôi đành trả phòng để chuyển khách sạn khác

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive:
This hotel has everything one can expect from great accommodation: the room was clean and big, with a balcony overlooking the rice fields and all the comforts.
The staff and service were amazing.
Breakfast is incredible, with Western and Asian options and an amazing policy to prevent people from wasting food: you are charged if you leave food on the plate!
Dinner at the restaurant was fabulous.
It's the perfect place to relax after a long day hiking without feeling overwhelmed.

review.rating: có dịp quay lại sapa chắc chắn sẽ lại đến Pao’s!

review.rating: Perhaps come back very soon too
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Awesome 🤩, clean , staffs happy and very professional, food is so good, many choice, breakfast is great, we had very good lunch there too.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive:
The property is gorgeous perched on a hill. You won't get nicer views in Sapa. It's quiet away from the hustle and bustle of the town, you actually feel like you are in with nature.

The rooms were nice and spacious and the window seat was a delight. The balcony overlooking the valley was the highlight to wake up every morning in the clouds was a dream.

The staff were so kind and attentive to our needs. We really felt like they knew us personally. They helped us secure tickets to Fansipan as well.

The breakfast buffet had plenty of choice and was very tasty.  The pool was phenomenal. It was warm and had beautiful views.

The shuttle into town was also very convenient to use and helpful.

reviewer.name: Patrick
reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.rating: Would love to come back to Sa Pa and stay at Pao’s.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
Everything was just amazing. We didn’t think we’d be able to come here but so glad we did.
The staff are brilliant, they can’t do enough for you and provided us with all the information and support we needed.
The room was clean and comfortable. Breakfast selection was good.
The location is great too, offering a shuttle bus in to Sa Pa town every 2hrs, but we also walked back to the hotel as it’s only 12-15 minutes. 
The gym was excellent, on the small side but offered nice techno gym equipment and decent weight selection. 
The value for the money was just brilliant and you can’t forget about the views.
review.comment_negative: The air conditioning within the room just seemed to stay at one temperature. We did call maintenance to look at this on our last night and they helped with the situation.

review.rating: Spacious accom. with great mountain views
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
The location is great, a bit outside of Sapa town which we liked (away from the crazy traffic). Quite a few restaurants nearby the hotel as well. Hotel offers free shuttle bus to Sapa town and some cultural/tribal exhibits in the lobby.
The room and bathroom is very spacious. The balcony view facing the mountain is great. 
Breakfast offers a wide range of local and international dishes. Staff is very friendly and helpful.
review.comment_negative: The walls seems not very sound proof- can hear the noisy neighbours or ppl in the hallway in the middle of the night.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive: Phòng view đẹp

review.rating: Luxurious Room and great hospitality from its staff
review.room_type: Suite
review.comment_positive:
The hospitality, room and other facilities of the hotel matches its 5star status in Sapa and the needs of its clientele in Sapa. Under the attentiveness and supervision of its Front Office manager Mr Nguyen Duc Thinh, guests are assured of a wonderful stay from check in to out. Like us you will feel very welcomed. 

This personable gentleman is an asset to the hotel to ensure repeat stays from guests.  Kudos to all the staff in Pao’s including Ton, Hung, and Denh from the Restaurant and Vang and Muon from Concierge and many others whose names we do not know who made our stay a memorable one.
review.comment_negative: nil

review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Gyönyörű szálloda, csodálatos a környék és a kilátás. A reggeli fantasztikus, egyszerűen pazar volt. Hatalmas választék, a dán édes péksüteményektől a helyi ételeken át. A medence is jó volt. Az alacarte menü is, nagyon jókat ettünk.
review.comment_negative: A személyzet nem minden tagja beszélt angolul, a vietnami vendégszeretet hiányzott picit, de a luxus mindent kompenzált.

reviewer.name: Titouan
reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.rating: La réalité ne représente pas exactement les photos.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive: La vue est jolie, l’architecture du bâtiment est original. La chambre confortable. Le personnel est agréable.
review.comment_negative:
Hôtel semble vide, sans vie, on ne croise des gens qu’au petit déjeuner.
Les tarifs pour le spa & petit déjeuner sont trop chers : 300.000 Dôngs pour le petit déjeuner. 
La qualité du petit déjeuner est passable, mais sans plus.
Le vent passait à travers la porte fenêtre, ce qui entraînait du bruit dans la chambre. 
La piscine n’a pas une aussi belle vue que sur les photos, on voit la route et les voitures depuis la piscine. 
Le jardin de la terrasse pourrait faire l’objet d’un peu plus d’entretien.
Il vaut mieux sortir de Sapa ville et aller loger dans les homestay dans la vallée.

review.comment_positive: The room we stayed in was clean and welcoming, I really appreciated an good quality bathroom with good water pressure. We stayed on the 5th floor with a balcony view of the rice fields. The breakfast and restaurant was amazing. The hotel was very spacious and I appreciate the complimentary shuttle bus service to the town centre.
review.comment_negative: There was very little to not like about this location. It was comfortable and the people were all very friendly and helpful.

review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Loved everything about this place. Its very modern with big, big rooms and most importantly it's spotlessly clean.  The breakfast buffet is enormous even the most picky eater will find something to their liking. The staff are so incredibly helpful and friendly. A word the the dinner menu its great and dishes are beautifully presented, great taste too. The hotel is located about a ten minute walk from the centre and the hotel offer a free shuttle bus to the square throughout the day. It's a surprisingly lively town which was evident from the noise rolling down the hill late in the evening. Grateful to be at a distance from it and able to get a great night's sleep. In addition to all the great things this hotel has to offer it has the absolute best views out over the valley.

Ce que je n’ai pas aimé, c’est le prix, c’était beaucoup trop cher. Pour ce que c’était, cela fait sept jours que nous sommes au Vietnam et que nous faisons des hôtels quatre et cinq étoiles et c’est le moins bien depuis le début de notre séjour.
La piscine ferme tôt, les scooters sont à rendre le soir à 11h. Le petit déjeuner n’est pas compris. Il faut rajouter 60 € de plus pour avoir une belle vue ainsi qu’une baignoire alors que normalement à ce prix là ça devrait être compris. ￼ sur les photos de l’hôtel. Nous avons de super belles chambres avec baignoire et belle vue, ￼ dans la réalité, il faut payer 60 € de plus pour avoir cette belle chambre là ￼

review.rating: rapport qualité prix décevant malgré un bon emplacement géographique
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive:
Surclassement de la chambre mais je ne sais pas si c’était vraiment un cadeau car des prises électriques ne fonctionnait pas, le sol était sale et notre lit double s’est avéré être deux lit s jumeaux collés finalement avec la séparation au milieu assez désagréable. 
Belle vue depuis l’hôtel et la chambre sur les rizières en terrasses et les montagnes. 
Bonnes pâtisserie au bar derrière la réception (super brownie). 
Bon accueil de la part des employés aimables. 
Service de location de scooter 150 000 VND pour une demi journée avec le plein de carburant complet inclus et deux casques. 
Excellent restaurant à 4 minutes de marche qui en vaut vraiment la peine : « Good morning view » tenu par une famille vietnamienne adorable. De notre séjour de 10 jours à Sapa, c’est de loin le meilleur restaurant où nous avons mangé : rapport qualité prix excellent.
review.comment_negative:
La chambre était salle, cheveux aux sols, et certaines prises murales ne fonctionnaient pas malgré l’intervention des techniciens de l’hôtel. 
La piscine un peu trop froide et la route qui est juste en face où l’on voit les voitures et où l’on entend les klaxons. 
Grand jacuzzi derrière la piscine ne fonctionnait pas, dommage. 
Aucun service de navette depuis l’hôtel jusqu’au centre ville pendant tout notre séjour de 04 jours. 
Petit déjeuner trop cher : 600 000 VND soit 27€ pour deux.
Prix exorbitants des massages et des soins comme dans tous les beaux hôtels de Sapa. 
Les produits gel douche, shampoing et lotion sont de mauvaises qualités, pas fait pour un hôtel 5 étoiles. 
La mauvaise insonorisation des chambres. 
La musique dans le couloir qui tourne en boucle et qui s’entend dans les chambres jusque tard le soir. 
Le coffre fort qui se verrouille sans explication, nous avons dû faire appel à un technicien de l’hôtel 3 fois en 4 jours… c’est très lourd. 
Un problème de climatisation HS le matin de 8H jusqu’en fin de matinée très certainement pour des raisons d’économie car programmées tous les matins et hôtel peu fréquenté en cette période. 
Au vu des problèmes rencontrés durant notre séjour, je pensais que le petit déjeuner d’une seule nuit que nous avons consommé, nous aurait été offert en guise de geste commercial, ce qui n’a pas été le cas.

review.comment_negative: Das Hotel hat unsere gebuchte Abholung am Bahnhof in Lao Cai verpennt. Der Poolbereich ist in einem eher ungepflegten zustand und lädt nach dem Trekking keinesfalls zur Erholung ein. Das Frühstück könnte besser sein.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: A really large room in this very large hotel.  From the staff who greet you to the staff who are looking after the pool excellent service is their aim.  The hotel itself is situated about a 10 minute walk down/up hill from the centre of Sapa which is lovely.  Unfortunately the weather was very misty so the view was somewhat obscured.  The restaurant and lobby areas are very spacious and comfortable.  Breakfast was a buffet and full of tasty food, Vietnamese and Western with a hot food station for freshly made omelettes, pho etc.  The pool area was lovely, again the staff were on hand to give towel etc.  the hotel offers a shuttle service to the centre of Sapa every two hours.  We used this to go up to the town and walked back.  There is a lovely bar on the 8th floor and a pool table if the weather was good. I would thoroughly recommend the hotel for a visit.  Really beautiful.

review.rating: Amazing hotel with great staff, views and food.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive:
The property is gorgeous sitting on the side of a cliff. You will have amazing views from the restaurant/breakfast area. The staff reception staff including Katy (Lieu I believe) are awesome! On the day we arrived, we got there several hours before check-in time. After my wife spoke with them the first time, they remembered our names and would say hi to us every time we walked by and asked if we needed any assistance. They were also able to check us in early and upgrade our room without any problems or hesitation. It seemed they went above and beyond in many instances, and it really is amazing customer service to be treated like you're special when staying anywhere. We also appreciated that they gave us local recommendations and would inquire our plans for the day to give us other suggestions. It really felt that throughout all of Vietnam, the customer service is far superior to what we've experienced at most places in the US.
We also really enjoyed the breakfast that was included in our rate. There was a great variety of options (everything from traditional Vietnamese dishes to American options, and more). We loved sitting in the restaurant and enjoying the gorgeous views. The staff was always kind and helpful. The coffee was delicious too!
Another thing to mention that we appreciated was the location. Pao's would be considered a bit off the beaten path, but for anyone seeking serenity in the mountains, this is an ideal place to stay. The hotel is directly next to Moana Sapa, which is a big tourist attraction. We walked down to Cat Cat Village one day (it's not a very long walk, but a little hard with traffic and the turns). We also walked frequently to and from the busier area (downtown Sapa?). It's a short walk up a hill to get in, and easy to come back down. We enjoyed having peace and quiet, less light pollution, and crazy views vs. being in town by all the action.
review.comment_negative: The pool area could be better as there is condensation everywhere. The hotel is really missing on an opportunity as the pool has great views, but the area doesn't feel as inviting as the rest of the hotel.

review.rating: Beautifully designed hotel, very relaxing stay!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive: This is a fantastic hotel, it's beautifully designed with cultural accents throughout reflecting the local area and people. We absolutely loved our room, lovely layout with a nice sized balcony and bathroom. The bed was very comfortable and the room exceptionally clean. We felt very relaxed here. Food was great, the breakfast buffet was amazing and replenished well, even almost at the end of breakfast time. Staff were very helpful, attentive and welcoming, with good English. Nice indoor pool. We had room service a few nights, and it was very good. There is a shuttle service to Sapa town, which you have to book at least 20 minutes in advance, it goes at particular times in the day. It's about a 20-30 minute walk into town which is not too strenuous, but the shuttle is a nice option.
review.comment_negative:
Our rooms location was just above reception, so we could unfortunately hear the children's play area from our room at times, but it was otherwise very quiet. 

We booked the return shuttle with the concierge team, from Sapa town to the hotel, but the minibus wasn't there at the agreed time. We contacted the hotel and there was a lot of confusion, but they said someone was on their way. We called them again, and they said traffic was too bad to get to us (It was very busy with traffic jams on side streets) so they said to get a taxi and the hotel will pay for our journey, the receptionist was very helpful and our journey was paid for when we got there, but we had been waiting in the rain for almost an hour after a busy day, so it was quite frustrating. We do appreciate that the hotel was able to help us in the end, and despite this we would definitely stay here again.

review.comment_positive: It's located right outside of town and takes about 15 minutes to walk to the main square. There is a free shuttle that will take you there and back every two hours if you don't want to walk. I think almost all the rooms have views of the mountain valley. We booked a classic room but still had our own balcony and mountain views. Breakfast was very good with lots of options definitely lives up to the five star vibe. The room was very spacious as well and large bathroom.
review.comment_negative: The walls were very thin. We were in a connected room and could hear almost everything that was going on in the opposite room. At night you can faintly hear the piano music coming from the hallway. There is also a night light in the bathroom that does not turn off unless you switch the master light off at the main door which isn't ideal since it turns off your ability to switch lights off anywhere else.

review.rating: Sehr schönes, modernes Hotel mit atemberaubender Aussicht
review.room_type: Suite
review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel befindet sich in der Nähe von vielen Restaurants und Geschäften, mitten in der Stadt. 
Das Personal war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit, die Zimmer sind sehr sauber sauber, modern und ruhig. Wir hatten leider Pech mit dem Nebel aber ein bisschen konnten wir dennoch den Ausblick genießen (im August/September soll es wohl kein Nebel geben). 
Das Frühstücksbuffet war sehr ergiebig, es sowohl typisch vietnamesisches Frühstück (warme Speisen) als auch westliches Frühstück (brot und aufschnitt, pancake etc.) 
Wir kommen auf jeden Fall im August/September mal wieder um die ganze Aussicht genießen zu können.

review.rating: Nice hotel, nice view, super friendly staff and good price.
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thung Lũng
review.comment_positive:
Very nice hotel, friendly staff and great view.
Đi nhiều nơi, đặt hàng trăm chỗ ở trên booking. Tuy nhiên rất ít khi viết review, chỉ khi chê mới viết. Tuy nhiên lần này viết vì đây là 1 trong những KS thực sự khiến mình hài lòng. Tinh tế trong cả đôi dép đi lại trong phòng. Thái độ nhân viên niềm nở và rất tốt, hỗ trợ và thân thiện với khách. Thậm chí nhân viên bảo vệ cũng được training và educated rất tốt, nói chuyện thân thiện và nhẹ nhàng với khách. Tôi đoán chủ KS là người cầu toàn giống tôi. Căn phòng tôi ở sạch sẽ và có đầy đủ cơ sở vật chất và tôi đặc biệt ấn tượng với bồn tắm trong phòng. Không nhiều khách sạn nào có bồn tắm chất lượng được như vậy. Tôi hài lòng về mọi điều và sẽ quay lại vào lần kế tiếp.
review.comment_negative: Đường đi vào khách sạn hơi nhỏ và nhiều xe tải cỡ lớn ngược chiều khiến tôi gặp khó trong việc lái xe riêng đến khách sạn. Tuy nhiên bãi đỗ xe rộng rãi, miễn phí và được trông giữ bởi bảo vệ

review.comment_positive: Nice mountain views from my balcony. Premium room was very spacious and had a large bathroom. Wide selection for breakfast.
review.comment_negative: More attention should be given to the rooftop bar to attract guests to go up there to enjoy the views and facility.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thung Lũng
review.comment_positive:
Wide variety of breakfast options, helpful and responsive staff, excellent service by Ms Katie Lieu, great views, convenient shuttle bus, etc. In summary a wonderful stay.

This was our second stay at this hotel. First stay we were at a classic double room and this time we were at a premium double twin room with valley view. This second room was bigger and the views were nicer, bathroom was also better with shower and a massive bathtub with our child enjoyed a lot. 

The issue of not having proper door at the shower that we encountered at the classic room was less of an issue at this room due to the bigger size of the shower area.
review.comment_negative: The AC stopped working properly the last day, and somehow they failed to fix it properly (technician came to our room to fix it but the room still took very long to get colder)

review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Ein wunderbares Hotel mit freundlichem Personal, überragendem Frühstücksbuffet und einer fantastischen Aussicht. Das Hotel liegt etwas abgeschieden, sodass man dem Trubel der blinkenden Stadt entkommen kann.
review.comment_negative: Leider gibt es keine Möglichkeit außerhalb des Zimmers komfortabel zu verweilen. Lediglich am Pool gibt es Liegen, welcher jedoch indoor ist.

review.rating: Wonderful hotel with beautiful view on the valley.
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thung Lũng
review.comment_positive: We stayed 4 nights in a Premium double room with valley view and we added one extra bed for convenience as we have 2 young kids. The room has a balcony and very clean and big. From the room we can see the valley and it was wonderful. My kids enjoyed the billard, the babyfoot table and the pool. We also enjoyed the restaurant with a wonderful view on the valley. Staff were friendly and helpful in recommending the day tours. We will definitely book again the hotel if we go back to Sapa.
review.comment_negative: May be to have the pool heated and offer more local food varieties

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thung Lũng

review.comment_positive:
Wir bekamen als wir angekommen sind erstmal kostenlos ein Uprgrade auf s Zimmer. Unglaublich Aussicht vom Balkon aus. 
Das Personal war über freundlich und sehr zuvorkommend. Wir hatte ein Problem mit der Klimaanlage, als wir das morgens berichtet haben, war noch in der Zeit wo wir gefrühstückt haben einer und hat das Problem gelöst. 
Der Shuttle Service ist kostenlos und fährt mehrmals am Tag vom Hotel ins Zentrum und zurück.

Staff was very caring and helpful

Breakfast selection was far from 5 stars. Missed an egg station (custom omelette, etc), Nutella and fresh orange juice just to name a few examples. 
The gym is an absolute joke for a five star hotel. It consists of 3 different stations and couldn't be worse located.

review.comment_positive: Everything was perfect. The room was big and nice. Terrace was also great. Swimming pool also nice, just the gym could be bigger but it seemed not to be used anyway. The hotel was well managed and efficient. The breakfast was the best we had nit only in Vietnam.

review.comment_positive: We stayed in this hotel for 3 days and 2 nights, the view is amazing in every area. Staffs were very accommodating, friendly and helpful in all of our requests. And the free buffet breakfast is everything with a variety of choices.We’ve enjoyed as well the buffet dinner with very affordable price. It was indeed exceed our expectations and will stay again if by chance to visit again SaPa.

review.rating: Piękny czysty hotel w dobrej lokalizacji, piekne widoki przy sprzyjającej pogodzie
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thung Lũng
review.comment_positive: Duży pokój, wygodne łóżko, balkon z widokiem na góry. Duża przestronna łazienka, prysznic + wanna. Duży wybór przy śniadaniu. Personel bardzo pomocny.
review.comment_negative: Spa - masaż szwedzki - temperatura pomieszczenia za zimną, pierwszy raz zmarzłam podczas masażu. Masaż odbywał się przy totalnie zaświeconym jasnym świetle, bez muzyki. Nastrój bardzo średni. Atmosfera przed i po bardzo poganiająca, koniec masażu proszę wyjść szybko. Spodziewałabym się lepszej obsługi w SPA w tak dobrym hotelu.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive: The property ticked all expectations and looked exactly as it was on Booking.com. Staff were always happy to help and go the extra mile. Especially the front desk Manager, which we believe her name was Katie.
review.comment_negative: Nothing to add here 👍

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng

My husband and I love our cocktails and the barmen made excellent ones. The rooms were amazing, we had one that faced the mountains so we had a beautiful view. We couldn’t ask for more.

review.rating: Great value for money at Pao's Sapa Leisure Hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
The view of the room was stunning, probably one of the best features of the place. 
The room is very spacious and well equipped with everything you need for a getaway in Sapa. 
The staff were very helpful and put their best efforts to ensure we had a wonderful stay, helping out with advise on what to do around Sapa, accommodating early luggage storage as well. 

Facilities wise, we tried up the heated indoors pool, which is very nice, especially after spending a full day in the cold wet weather outside.
review.comment_negative:
We have requested for early check in on the morning of arrival (very late request from our side), which unfortunately was not something that could be accommodated.
While it was a very late request from our side, it would have been great to be available, but by no means a deal breaker. 
We loved the place. 

Facilities wise, it would have been nice to have access to a dry sauna within the hotel, unfortunately not available.

review.rating: Harassed with messages and phone calls after my stay
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thung Lũng
review.comment_positive: Room was spacious and clean. Room service was quick. Bath tub was large and comfortable to use. Motorbike rental was available at the front desk (albeit at a 100% markup from rates at the town center). During our stay, staff were generally helpful and friendly.
review.comment_negative:
After rating the hotel 3 stars on Booking.com, I received a barrage of Whatsapp messages and phone calls from the hotel staff, which I found highly inappropriate and intrusive. This has led me to revise my rating to 2 stars. Reasons for my initial 3 star rating below:

- The hotel's air conditioning emitted a smoky odor, resulting in sore throats and illness for my family. The room's ventilation design (toilet doors were meshed and not solid), coupled with a strong bathroom dehumidifier, created an uncomfortably dry environment in the whole room.

- The pool was in poor condition, appearing dirty and smelling unpleasant, with visible mold around the area. It was nothing like the photos. Additionally, the gym was small and overlooking the entrance car park, with close to zero privacy.

- During check-in, I was offered a complimentary Christmas Eve dinner, confirmed by multiple staff members. However, at checkout, I was unexpectedly billed VND 1.4 million for the meal. Although the charge was eventually dropped, the situation was unpleasant.

- While completing a feedback form during checkout, I felt pressured by the staff, who scrutinized my responses and questioned my ratings.

- Paying VND 18.3 million for a 3-night stay in Sapa (USD 250 / night), I expected higher service standards and better facilities. The post-stay harassment by the hotel further deteriorated my overall experience.

review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn

It's 30 minutes walking to the 'center' of Sapa. Every 2 hours there is a free shuttle from the hotel, otherwise you pay for it. The swimming pool is very big but inside...

review.comment_positive: Our stay at Pao's Sapa Leisure Hotel was nothing short of magical. Surrounded by misty mountains and terraced rice fields, the hotel's ambiance was enchanting. The rooms were cozy, offering stunning views of the Sapa Valley, while the staff's warm hospitality made us feel at home. The hotel's spa and wellness facilities provided a relaxing escape after days of exploring. With delicious local cuisine and thoughtful amenities, Pao's Sapa Leisure Hotel truly captured the essence of Sapa's natural beauty and offered an unforgettable experience. We left rejuvenated and utterly charmed

review.comment_positive: Im Hotel angekommen wurden wir sehr freundlich vom Personal empfangen. Wir waren relativ spontan zwei Nächte früher angereist als wir gebucht hatten, was aber überhaupt kein Problem war. Das Frühstück war sehr lecker mit einer riesigen Auswahl und der Service war exzellent! Das Zimmer und Badezimmer war sauber und jeden Tag wurde das Zimmer gereinigt. Die Zimmer sind ein wenig in die Jahre gekommen, was wir aber überhaupt nicht schlimm fanden. Der Ausblick vom Zimmer und der Bar ist sehr schön gewesen. Die Unterkunft liegt etwas außerhalb von Sa Pa, das Hotel bietet aber einen kostenlosen Shuttle in die Stadt. Wir sind die Strecke jedoch am liebsten gelaufen, da es wirklich nicht weit zu Fuß ist.

review.rating: Fantastisches Hotel, herausragender Service, zuvorkommendes und aufmerksames Personal
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel liegt etwas am Rande von Sapa City, dadurch ist es wunderbar ruhig. Bei unserer Ankunft wurden wir mit einem Tee begrüßt und erhielten ein Upgrade. Die Aussicht vom Zimmer auf die Reis Terrassen und Fansipan ist atemberaubend. Das Zimmer (Deluxe room mit garden view) ist sehr geräumig und modern gestaltet. Die Betten waren sehr bequem.
Das Frühstücks Buffet war hervorragend. Von vietnamesischen Spezialitäten bis hin zu einer umfangreiche Angebot an Obst, Brot und Gebäck sowie anderen warmen und kalten Speisen konnte man ausgiebig frühstücken. Das Personal war da auch stets aufmerksam, haben regelmäßig aufgefüllt sodass man zu jeder Uhrzeit mehr als ausreichend Auswahl hatte. 
Es wurde zudem ein kostenfreier Shuttle Service in die Stadt Bzw Pick up Service aus der Stadt angeboten. 
Das Rezeptionspersonal war stets sehr bemüht uns in unseren Anliegen weiter zu helfen.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thung Lũng
review.comment_positive:
Der Service war mit Abstand der beste den wir je hatten. Ich war weltweit in vielen Hotels aber hier war das Personal sehr gut trainiert. Das Hotel befindet sich 5 Minuten mit dem Taxi oder 10 Minuten zu Fuß von der Innenstadt. Sobald man mit dem Taxi ankommt wird man sofort empfangen, die Koffer werden genommen und man wird bis ins Zimmer begleitet. Frühstück war sehr gut und abwechslungsreich. Von asiatisch bis hin zur westlichen Küche war alles dabei. Verschiedene Patisserie, Pho Suppen, Spiegeleier, Früchte, versch. brot, Wurst und Käsesorten uvm. 
Wir hatten das Premium Doppelzimmer und die Aussicht war ein Traum. Zimmerservice etc. Hat einwandfrei geklappt. Die Mitarbeiter bringen einem alles ins Zimmer und helfen einem bei allem. Alle sind sehr bemüht einem den Aufenthalt perfekt zu machen. Wir wurden auch vom Zimmer einmal aus angerufen und gefragt ob alles in Ordnung ist und ob es noch was gibt, was das Hotel machen kann um unseren Aufenthalt noch besser zu machen. Wie gesagt das Personal und der Service waren wirklich top und einwandfrei. Besser hätte es nicht sein können. Vielen Dank an das gesamte Team!

Phòng Cổ Điển Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Dit hotel is echt top. Locatie is geweldig met uitzicht over de vallei met rijstvelden. Receptie helpt je met alles en er gaan gratis busjes naar het centrum heen en terug. Scooters te huren bij het hotel zelf. Ontbijt is onwijs uitgebreid en heerlijk. Kamer is groot en bied zachte en grote bedden. Badkamer is ook groot en een heerlijke inloopdouche.
review.comment_negative: De airco op onze kamer blies niet heel hard. Je kan dit niet zelf instellen, is een soort van climate control. Na aangeven bij de receptie hebben ze hem handmatig koider gezet in onze kamer ofzo maar dit hielp niet echt. Ondanks dat is de kamer en het hotel echt top. Ga hier slapen!!

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thung Lũng
Phòng Cổ Điển Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_negative: El hotel en si muy bien, ahora la gestión de lo más lamentable que he visto. Ya que te venden que hay bus gratuito que te lleva al centro de la Sapa, pero al ser gratuito es bastante concurrido por lo que te recomiendan reservar. Aquí viene el punto, nosotros reservamos para las 12 el bus ya que teniamos que irnos con las maletas y era importante salir a la hora. Nuestra sorpresa due cuando fuimos a buscar el bus y 372828 viernamitas subieron a él dejandonos sin lugar. En ese momento nos molestamos porque nosotros habiamos reservado el dia antes sitio para poder irnos con las maletas y todo y el conductor sin saber ni una palabra de ingles queria irse. Esto aun nos enfadó más y fuimos a hablar con la mujer de recepción que aun aumentó nuestro enfado cuando mos dijo: lo siento esperaros 15 min más. Cuando nosotros habiamos reservado porq teniamls que coger el transporte para irnos. Muy mala gestión horrible y encima no entienden absolutamente nada

review.comment_positive: La gentillesse du personnel, le calme et la vue paisible ainsi que la spacieuse chambre et la magnifique baignoire qui donne sur le balcon où se trouve un rosier :-) c’était ressourçant, très propre!! De belles attentions chaque soir, un chocolat, les rideaux fermés etc. Un grand merci pour cette retraite calme en montagne agitée au centre de Sapa. Une belle piscine aussi où nager tranquillement :-) de plus j’ai été sûr classée! Excellent rapport qualité / prix. Du personnel souriant et aux petits soins ! Un très grand merci!

review.comment_positive: Convenience of location to Sapa town with hotel shutter service.  Room is good.  Reception staff are very good.  Tina (her English name) was very helpful.
review.comment_negative: Weather too foggy, not hotel's fault.  Breakfasts are chargeable.  When I booked the room it says come with breakfasts but they still charge. A hotel of this calibre should provide free breakfasts.  After all, the hotel wasn't cheap.  We paid 3mil + VND for 2 nights.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel with fabulous staff and impeccable service. We reached Sapa way before the check in time, Ngoc Quyen gave us options to pay for early check in or freshen up ourselves at the shower facility near the indoor heated pool. We chose the latter and he was equally helpful to serve us. He even went beyond his way to let us know the best route when we asked for direction to visit Fansipan. Totally recommending this hotel and Quyen is a gem!
review.comment_negative: We probably visited at the wrong time of the year, it was extremely foggy. But this is not the hotel's fault, just that we also couldn't take nice picture around or visit Moana Cafe right next door. Oh ya, did anyone mention this hotel is right in front of a cemetery mountain?

review.comment_positive:
조식이 국내 여느 호텔정도로 푸짐하고 맛있었습니다!!!  베트남식 + 빵 + 샐러드류 + 치즈 + 음료 + 과일 종류가 정말 다양하고 맛도 괜찮았어요.
방 뷰가 기가막히고 윈도우 시트에서 친구랑 맥주마시고 재밌게 보냈습니다. 발코니도 너무 좋은데 모기때문에 오래있진 못했고 판시팡가는 티켓 예약해주고 늦으면 전기셔틀 태워주고 정말 친절합니다. 다만 약간 조명을 꺼두는 에코프렌들리한 사파의 분위기가 있어서 약간은 휑한 분위기가 있었지만요..!!
review.comment_negative: 점심을 호텔 내 레스토랑에서 닭고기 요리와 돼지고기 구운거 먹었는데... 비추합니다ㅠ 똠얌꿍은 맛있었어요!! 다른분들은 핫팟 드시던데 그건 맛있으려나 조식을 드시고 그 외 식사는 사파 타운가서 맛집 가시는 것을 강력하게 추천드릴게요 ㅠㅠㅠ 귀찮다고 안나갔는데 조금 후회했어요

review.comment_positive:
The staff at Pao's were very friendly, helpful and sincere. I escaped here for my birthday and was surprised by a cake and well wishes on the day.  A very unexpected and personal touch.

The location is a short walk from central Sapa town, with fabulous views over the valley and surrounding countryside. 

The room and facilities were spotlessly clean and tidy, and the restaurant was amazing.

I would highly recommend.

A special mention to Front Office Manager Mr Nguyen Duc Thinh for making me feel very welcome and for sharing his local knowledge.

review.comment_positive: We've been very lucky to get a free upgrade to a Deluxe Double. The balcony in the room was nice to view sunset at your own space. The hotel provides a stunning view of Sapa. Frontdesk staff was polite and helpful, which we're thankful for. It was definitely a lovely stay that we decided to extend one more day in Sapa.

review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
We absolutely loved our stay at Pao's. It looks exactly like the photos (which is not always the case), was very comfortable and all the staff were lovely. We had originally stayed for 3 nights, and ended up extending an extra 9 because it was such a nice place to base ourselves. The value for money was second to none.
Views over the valley from the balcony were outstanding. The desk in the room had plenty of space to work, and there were common seating areas if you wanted to have a change of scenery. 
The breakfast buffet had something for everyone. We also utilized the gym quite a bit (the full set of dumbells was great).
We had originally thought it may have been a little far away, but the walk to town is actually very easy. They also have the free shuttle that runs basically every 2 hours, or you can just take a paid electric vehicle from the door.

review.rating: Overall a very happy and pleasant stay.

review.comment_positive: The hotel was very thoughtful to have prepared a wedding anniversary surprise for us. Our room was upgraded for free, the kind staff also decorated the room and provided a cute cake. Beautiful view from the balcony, quiet location away from the town center. Friendly and prompt service, very helpful staff. Breakfast has good enough variety and tastes great.
review.comment_negative:
It’s probably one of the best hotels in Sapa but I won’t consider it a real 5 star. Room size is on the small side, light is dim so not easy for those who need to do makeup. Shower water temperature is not very stable. 
on the last day of our stay the neighboring room turned on TV before 7am which could be heard very clearly from our room so sound isolation between rooms was poor. 
However to be fair, for a very remote location like Sapa it’s probably not realistic to expect a real 5 star hotel.

review.rating: Un endroit exceptionnel au coeur d’un paysage sublime !
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive:
Un établissement de grande classe ! Nous avons eu la chance d’avoir une chambre avec vue sur la vallée et avons même été surclassé ! Autant dire que nous avons très bien vu les rizières en terrasses que nous étions venus chercher.
Nous sommes dans un 5 étoiles, donc le service se doit d’être au niveau. Et c’est le cas. Des garçons d’étage serviables, un accueil toujours prêt à organiser vos sorties et déplacement.
Un point particulier sur la restauration. Etant un peu éloigné du centre de Sa Pa (il le faut si on veut voir les rizières au lever du soleil), nous devons nous restaurer sur place. Et bien la cuisine est extrêmement bien faite, de qualité, avec des produits frais. Et le petit déjeuner est très copieux, alliant le continental avec le vietnamien, soupes différentes chaque matin, banh cuon, etc…
L’équipe du spa est très efficace également pour un massage des pieds après une journée de marche.
Dommage que le rooftop bar ait été fermé lors de notre séjour…
Nous conseillons vraiment cet endroit !
review.comment_negative: Rien

review.rating: Spectacular view of Muong Hoa Valley from the balcony and restaurant. Good breakfast.
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The location is excellent with the full/panorama view over Muong Hoa Valley.  The breakfast is buffet and the taste of all dishes are so good, especially the noodles and the local dishes such as steam sticky rice, rice soup, and Chung cake. The restaurant serving breakfast gives breathtaking view over Muong Hoa Valley and mountains.
review.comment_negative: There should be a shelve at the entrance of the room for luggages and shoes. The free electric vehicle to the town centre should be more frequent instead of 2 hours/trip. Free bicylce shall be excellent.

review.rating: great view, wished there were better appliances
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive:
convenient location, great view and amenities. 
sadly the fog was too think to see the view but still worth it.
review.comment_negative: aircon was too warm and stuffy in room despite it being cold outside. wished the aircon controller was more interactive to adjust the temperature.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thung lũng
review.comment_positive: Chưa bao h mình dc trải nghiệm dv ksan tốt đến thế. Các bạn nv luôn rất nhẹ nhàng, vui vẻ và support khách, đặc biệt là chị qly ở nhà hàng. Giá cả rất hợp lý so với một ksan gần trung tâm mà vẫn có view thung lũng siêu đỉnh. Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, rộng rãi và đồ đạc quang cảnh dc take care tốt, ko bị cũ. Nếu ai lười ra ngoài có thể thử nhà hàng A Ling trong ksan nha. Tối t7 có buffet lẩu tầm 490/pax thì phải, buffet sáng ngon và đa dạng. Nchung mình rất hài lònggg.
review.comment_negative: Cái này tiểu tiết thôi nhg phòng 316 mình ở cái chốt cửa ban công hơi khó mở, mình phải loay hoay một lúc mới mở dc còn người lớn tuổi hơn thì chịu lun. Pao’s nghiên cứu sửa lại cái chốt này nhé =)) còn đâu t k có gì để chê.
